document_data.name: Guise of the Yak-Man
document_data.mainbody: '''''Guise of the Yak-Man''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects:
The spell made the target appear as a vile [[yak-man]] as far as all of the physical senses were concerned. Only a ''[[true seeing]]'' spell could pierce this illusion. This spell could only be dispelled through a ''[[wish]]''. This illusion was so strong that even creatures, such as [[undead]], that were normally immune to illusions, were affected.

While under the guise of a yak-man, the target would never be harmed or hindered by a [[dao]]. However, most civilized folk of Zakhara despised the yak-men, so the target could not encounter other [[humanoid]]s without being attacked on sight.
document_data.Components: This spell required a hair from a yak-man to cast.
